message: Let's start fair. I'll take 95, you get 5.  We can adjust if you think that's unfair.
I'll start with a slightly more generous offer. Your turn to adjust!
I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not happy with the last offer. Let's try 90 for me, 10 for you.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up too much. Your turn to adjust again!
We're getting close to the end here. Let's meet in the middle. I'll take 85, you take 15.  This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to accept your final offer. I think I can do better. Let's try again!
